00019 #ifndef _POSIX_INTERNAL_H
00020 #define _POSIX_INTERNAL_H
00021 
00022 #include <nucleus/xenomai.h>
00023 #include <nucleus/core.h>
00024 #include <posix/posix.h>
00025 
00026 #define PSE51_MAGIC(n) (0x8686##n##n)
00027 #define PSE51_ANY_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(00)
00028 #define PSE51_THREAD_MAGIC      PSE51_MAGIC(01)
00029 #define PSE51_THREAD_ATTR_MAGIC PSE51_MAGIC(02)
00030 #define PSE51_MUTEX_MAGIC       PSE51_MAGIC(03)
00031 #define PSE51_MUTEX_ATTR_MAGIC  PSE51_MAGIC(04)
00032 #define PSE51_COND_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(05)
00033 #define PSE51_COND_ATTR_MAGIC   PSE51_MAGIC(05)
00034 #define PSE51_SEM_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(06)
00035 #define PSE51_KEY_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(07)
00036 #define PSE51_ONCE_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(08)
00037 #define PSE51_MQ_MAGIC          PSE51_MAGIC(09)
00038 #define PSE51_MQD_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(0A)
00039 #define PSE51_INTR_MAGIC        PSE51_MAGIC(0B)
00040 #define PSE51_NAMED_SEM_MAGIC   PSE51_MAGIC(0C)
00041 #define PSE51_TIMER_MAGIC       PSE51_MAGIC(0D)
00042 #define PSE51_SHM_MAGIC         PSE51_MAGIC(0E)
00043 
00044 #define PSE51_MIN_PRIORITY      XNCORE_LOW_PRIO
00045 #define PSE51_MAX_PRIORITY      XNCORE_HIGH_PRIO
00046 
00047 #define ONE_BILLION             1000000000
00048 
00049 #define pse51_obj_active(h,m,t) \
00050 ((h) && ((t *)(h))->magic == (m))
00051 
00052 #define pse51_obj_deleted(h,m,t) \
00053 ((h) && ((t *)(h))->magic == ~(m))
00054 
00055 #define pse51_mark_deleted(t) ((t)->magic = ~(t)->magic)
00056 
00057 static inline void ticks2ts(struct timespec *ts, xnticks_t ticks)
00058 {
00059     ts->tv_sec = xnarch_uldivrem(xnpod_ticks2ns(ticks),
00060                                  ONE_BILLION,
00061                                  &ts->tv_nsec);
00062 }
00063 
00064 static inline xnticks_t ts2ticks_floor(const struct timespec *ts)
00065 {
00066     xntime_t nsecs = ts->tv_nsec;
00067     if(ts->tv_sec)
00068         nsecs += (xntime_t) ts->tv_sec * ONE_BILLION;
00069     return xnpod_ns2ticks(nsecs);
00070 }
00071 
00072 static inline xnticks_t ts2ticks_ceil(const struct timespec *ts)
00073 {
00074     xntime_t nsecs = ts->tv_nsec;
00075     unsigned long rem;
00076     xnticks_t ticks;
00077     if(ts->tv_sec)
00078         nsecs += (xntime_t) ts->tv_sec * ONE_BILLION;
00079     ticks = xnarch_ulldiv(nsecs, xnpod_get_tickval(), &rem);
00080     return rem ? ticks+1 : ticks;
00081 }
00082 
00083 static inline xnticks_t clock_get_ticks(clockid_t clock_id)
00084 {
00085     if(clock_id == CLOCK_REALTIME)
00086         return xnpod_get_time();
00087     else
00088         return xnpod_ns2ticks(xnpod_get_cpu_time());
00089 }
00090 
00091 /* Convert an absolute timeout for clock clock_id to a relative timeout. */
00092 static inline int clock_adjust_timeout(xnticks_t *timeoutp, clockid_t clock_id)
00093 {
00094     xnsticks_t delay;
00095 
00096     if(*timeoutp == XN_INFINITE)
00097         return 0;
00098 
00099     delay = *timeoutp - clock_get_ticks(clock_id);
00100     if(delay <= 0)
00101         return ETIMEDOUT;
00102 
00103     *timeoutp = delay;
00104     return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 #endif /* !_POSIX_INTERNAL_H */
